newsitem.title: MEXICO: More Mexico ports close amid high winds -gov't.
newsitem.headline: More Mexico ports close amid high winds -gov't.

text.p: More ports were shut along the Gulf of Mexico for a total of five closures, the Communications and Transport Ministry said in its 1500 local/2300 GMT meteorological bulletin on Thursday.
Additional port closures were at Ciudad del Carmen and Campeche in Campeche state, as a cold front moved southeast along the Gulf of Mexico.
Although under the jurisdiction of Ciudad del Carmen, Cayo Arcas crude shipping report remained open amid wind speeds of 60 km, operations captain Salvador Palomero told Reuters.
Pajaritos and Dos Bocas crude ports remained shut because of strong winds, the bulletin said. Pajaritos shut at 0850 local/1450 GMT and Dos Bocas closed at 0925 local/1525 GMT.
